definitions.definition: Characteristic of familiar conversation, of common parlance; informal.

parsedExamples.example: You're using too many colloquial words in this cover letter: I suggest changing I picked up loads of cool skills to I acquired a great deal of positive abilities
The colloquial and at times sarcastic tone of her books make her popular with teenagers.
